issue.title: [CF 97] Rune ignore bugs
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Use Pillar of Frost and wait 50 sec
2. now use both frostrunes, for exemble Howling Blast on trainDummy
3. for real, Pillar of Frost hast 8 sec left cd, but TMW shows Pillar of Frost is rdy

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?
the expected output: i see the icon of Pillar of Frost 60 sec after i use it.
instead 1: i see the icon if i use both frostrune after 50 sec
instead 2: i see the icon if i use a frostrune after 45 sec and the other after 51 sec

first 3.0.0, then 3.0.1, problem stay.

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No error

Please provide any additional information below.

The Problem is if i have 20 Addons and if i have just TMW. But if i have TMW + Coolline, the bug of TMW do the same with Coolline.
Without TMW, i use Pillar of Frost, the icon slides on the line for 60 sec, then Blinkscreen.
With TMW, i use Pillar of Frost, the icon slides on the line untill the "after 50 sec" Bug of TMW is cuming, then the icon instant gone without blinkscreen.

So i mean the TMW Bug has effect to other Addons.

If i disable the "Ignore Runes" that will not happen.


> Posted by CurseForge user ttester | Imported from CurseForge issue #97 | Raw

comments.body:
Attachment Added: TellMeWhen.lua

TellMeWhen.lua


> Posted by CurseForge user ttester

I have never seen a stranger bug than this one with TMW interfering with CoolLine. I checked a million times for leaked globals, checked the output of everything, and nothing was out of place. Also related to this is the flickering cooldowns bug that someone else reported.

With this option causing at least three bugs, I'm just going to throw it out. Sorry for the inconvenience, and thank you for bringing this to my attention.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
